segments.text: This scene in the kitchen tugs at my heart a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is diligently drying that plate, so focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink overflow means trouble she's unaware of.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pooling at her feet, and she might slip anytime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbing the stool looks so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching for cookies, but the stool tilts dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, her hand out for a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids being kids, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view contrasts this potential sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the mom would turn around and see them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this unnoticed hazard makes me feel down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron and towel add to the everyday tragedy here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hoping no one gets hurt in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
